fields.headline: Obituary letter: Nina Milkina
fields.bodyText: Alec Fleming writes: Jessica Duchen's fine account of the career of Nina Milkina (December 5) reminded me of a BBC radio series not mentioned, Music in Miniature. I gratefully and nostalgically recall hurrying home as a youngster in the 1960s to listen to the weekly afternoon chamber-music programmes given by the pianist and her colleagues.
